Fatal Hillpark house fire in Auckland started in chimney, no smoke alarms found https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/fatal-hillpark-house-fire-in-auckland-started-in-chimney-no-smoke-alarms-found/ZVBV3T47AFDGBHLZP6V43UOLFE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/fatal-hillpark-house-fire-in-auckland-started-in-chimney-no-smoke-alarms-found/ZVBV3T47AFDGBHLZP6V43UOLFE/ A full investigation into the cause of the fire has now been completed. Photo / Michael Craig
